attributes.title: UIDT v3.5: DESI-Optimized Framework - Vacuum Information Density
attributes.description:
Version 3.5 presents the definitive, consolidated theoretical framework for the Unified Information-Density Theory (UIDT). 

Core Scientific Updates:
• Integration of DESI DR2 & JWST CCHP observational data
• Holographic scale fixed at 0.66 nm (phenomenological fit)
• Vacuum energy hierarchical suppression mechanism (10^33 residual)
• Explicit evidence classification system (Category A-D)

This revision supersedes all previous versions (v3.2, v3.3, v3.4) and establishes the canonical parameter set for future research.
